10.10.24  5:06 pm   What's better
The floor
the ceiling

Â Â Â Â Â due to constant improvements they are constantly getting better than each other

     Speaking of which, what counts as a floor? For some, the floor is its own table, which means the floor is not a floor but a table.

Â Â Â Â Â i'm don't see why that would preclude it from still being a floor. somethings can be both things

     A ceiling is easy, because there is very rarely natural solid ceilings. So what is is a floor

Â Â Â Â Â  a platform on which people can safely walk, among other things

10.10.24  7:22 am   Earlier you said the color of a mirror was grey. This is false, mirrors are actually very slightly green. Explain your choice of words

Â Â Â Â Â  you explain yours. there's no reason a mirror has to be green. maybe some of them are. the most important feature of a mirror is that its reflectivity is as high as possible, near 100%. but you already know that and that is arguably not the point of your inquiry
